Sentencas: The forced periodic reversal of the flow is proposed for the case of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) monolith.
Titulo: The transient operation of a solid oxide fuel cell monolith under forced periodic reversal of the flow

Sentencas: A one-dimensional non-steady state heterogeneous model is applied to an investigation of H-2 electrochemical oxidation in a co-current flow solid oxide monolithic fuel cell.
Titulo: The transient operation of a solid oxide fuel cell monolith under forced periodic reversal of the flow

Sentencas: Results are reported on the transient evolution along the reactor, of the species conversion, temperature distribution, thermodynamic energy conversion efficiency and volumetric power density.
Titulo: The transient operation of a solid oxide fuel cell monolith under forced periodic reversal of the flow

Sentencas: This novel transient operation of an SOFC leads to improved and highly efficient performances, thus allowing for a combination of the concepts of a regenerative heat preheater and of an electrocatalytic converter, in a single SOFC monolithic assembly.
Titulo: The transient operation of a solid oxide fuel cell monolith under forced periodic reversal of the flow
